name: Stellenbosch Flying Club
about: Stellenbosch Flying Club is an approved aviation training organisation (ATO: CAA/1206) located in the picturesque Stellenbosch Wine-lands, surrounded by the Hottentots-Holland mountain region. Our flight school offers a range of courses including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Night Rating, Instrument Rating, and Instructor's Rating. With a fleet of modern aircraft, our students gain valuable experience flying in controlled airspace, including landings at Cape Town International Airport. Our experienced instructors provide top-notch training, ensuring students receive comprehensive instruction and real-world flying experience. We are committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals in a beautiful and professional environment.
services:
